mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RemoveConfig(name, comment, type, appId, author, isDefault) VALUES(#{name}, #{comment}, #{type}, #{appId}, #{author}, #{isDefault})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RemoveConfig WHERE appId=#{appId} AND `name`=#{name} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT * FROM RemoveConfig WHERE id=#{1} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, b.`name` AS appname, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM RemoteConfigParam WHERE envid = a.id ) subItemsCount FROM envconfig a LEFT JOIN apps b ON a.appId = b.id WHERE a.type=#{type} or #{type} = -1) a where a.appid in (select id from apps where disable=0 and (appId=#{appId} or #{appId}=0)) ORDER BY updateTime DESC

SELECT a.*, b.`name` AS appname, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM RemoteConfigParam WHERE envid = a.id ) subItemsCount FROM envconfig a LEFT JOIN apps b ON a.appId = b.id WHERE a.appId=#{0} or #{0}=0 ORDER BY a.id DESC limit #{1},#{2}
